Detailed Description

Class DataConnProfile is the base class of data bearer settings.

Enumerator:
c_default_idle_timeout  2 minutes.
c_default_linger_timeout  30 seconds.
c_infinite_timeout  Infinite timeout.
c_no_timeout  No timeout.

Member Function Documentation

void DataConnProfile::Assign (  const DataConnProfile &  from_dcp  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Copies and sets all properties of the given data connection profile object, especially used for cloning.

Reimplemented in CsdDataConnProfile, and PsdDataConnProfile.

DataConnProfilePtr DataConnProfile::Clone (   )  const
 

Returns a clone of the current data connection profile.

DataConnPtr DataConnProfile::CreateDataConn (  const DataConnProfilePtr &  profile  )  [static, protected]
 

Returns a new data connection according to the given data connection profile. The data connection returned is wrapped into a smart pointer. The profile must be valid, otherwise an assertion holds.

Returns:
A DataConnPtr wrapping either a new data connection or 0 if there is not enough memory left.

void DataConnProfile::EnablePasswdQuery (  BOOLEAN  enable = TRUE  )  [inline]
 

Enable/disable mandatory password query.

const String& DataConnProfile::GetAccount (   )  const [inline]
 

Return login name of data account.

DataConnProfileId DataConnProfile::GetId (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns unique id for profile (can be used to reference profile).

UINT16 DataConnProfile::GetIdleTimeout (   )  const [inline]
 

Get idle timeout value in seconds (max. 1024). After defined number of seconds without inbound or outbound data transfer, the connection will be automatically shut down.

UINT16 DataConnProfile::GetLingerTimeout (   )  const [inline]
 

Get linger timeout value in seconds (max. 1024). When the last socket referring to a data connection releases the data connection then the data connection is not released immediately but stays alive for the specified amount of seconds. During this time a setup request for the same data connection is very fast. If no setup request takes place, then after the linger timeout the data connection is shut down physically.

const WString& DataConnProfile::GetName (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the user defined name of the bearer profile.

const String& DataConnProfile::GetPasswd (   )  const [inline]
 

Return login password of data account.

Returns the IP address of the primary DNS server.

const IpAddr& DataConnProfile::GetSecondaryDnsServerAddress (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the IP address of the secondary DNS server.

Return type of profile.

BOOLEAN DataConnProfile::IsReadOnly (   )  const [inline]
 

TRUE if profile is predefined and can't be modified.

void DataConnProfile::SetAccount (  const String &  account  )  [inline]
 

Set login name of data account. Length restrictions apply according to c_account_len_max.

void DataConnProfile::SetIdleTimeout (  UINT16  timeout  )  [inline]
 

Set idle timeout value of data connection. Set to c_no_timeout to deactivate the timer.

void DataConnProfile::SetLingerTimeout (  UINT16  timeout  )  [inline]
 

Set linger timeout value of data connection. Set to c_no_timeout to deactivate the timer.

void DataConnProfile::SetName (  const WString &  name  )  [inline]
 

Set the user defined name of the bearer profile. Length restrictions apply according to c_host_name_len_max.

void DataConnProfile::SetPasswd (  const String &  passwd  )  [inline]
 

Set password of data account. Length restrictions apply according to c_passwd_len_max. Note that APOXI socket system will not perform password queries on its own.

void DataConnProfile::SetPrimaryDnsServerAddress (  const IpAddr &  primary_dns  )  [inline]
 

Sets the IP address of the primary DNS server. Note that DNS might not be supported in all configurations.

void DataConnProfile::SetReadOnly (   )  [inline]
 

Define profile as read only.

void DataConnProfile::SetSecondaryDnsServerAddress (  const IpAddr &  secondary_dns  )  [inline]
 

Sets the IP address of the secondary DNS server. Note that DNS might not be supported in all configurations.
